title: Hard carbon with an opened pore structure for enhanced sodium storage performance
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02519A, Paper
Shunzhang You, Qiaobao Zhang, Junxiang Liu, Qiang Deng, Zhefei Sun, Dandan Cao, Tongchao Liu, Khalil Amine, Chenghao Yang
OP-HC shows a high specific capacity of 350.7 mA h gâˆ’1 with ultra-high ICE. These results are attributed to its opened pore and enlarged d002 interlayer spacing, which can enhance the reversibility of Na+ adsorption, intercalation and filling process.
